title: First Look: Challenge Gravine Gravel Tire Improves Bite for Soft Conditions
content:
The Gravine is Challenge Tires' more aggressive gravel offering, handmade with 260 TPI and available in Pro & XP series casings

Read the full article at First Look: Challenge Gravine Gravel Tire Improves Bite for Soft Conditions on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
